title: Grade 6 - French Immersion Language Arts & Literature
subject: French Immersion Language Arts & Literature (2025)

document.title: Grade 6 - French Immersion Language Arts & Literature

jurisdiction.title: Holy Spirit Catholic School Division - Alberta, Canada

E0929CA9CC694220B5D96906266CCF85.description: Students integrate the elements of sentence grammar studied into the interpretation and formation of sentences of various types and forms, in context.

5CCC67DB0A9349909F62FF283A9E890C.description: How can the analysis of sentence grammar facilitate mutual understanding?

B6051FCA9E604A1CB40CDF60B4885699.description: Grammar: The understanding and application of grammar promotes effective communication of ideas when speaking and writing.

96694A308F464759BBC3FAD6C80F9F45.description: Students adapt their approach to generating, planning, writing, and sharing their ideas according to the requirements of the text genre, while demonstrating persistance in pursuing personal goals.

4A7D8FA7746C4B92A1482437F5006FCF.description: How does reflecting on the writing process improve the quality of oneâ€™s writing and help to achieve goals that foster identity development?

9ACC6EC2236743DB8050E8F6FE998421.description: Text Production: Text production and creativity allow for the sharing of ideas and information in various contexts.

96AAEFF8F4384480AD4378F85D00F935.description: Students read texts at their independent reading level with fluency, expression, and automaticity in various contexts.

30073B36BD544AB4B7BFCEB0F1F957B7.description: How can fluency contribute to the development of competent readers?

F6D68A793C484B87B8A514FC1F0D3F9B.description: Reading Fluency: Reading fluency development promotes oral and written comprehension and expression.

3557F7B4AAE94229AB309B6E7B466974.description: Students analyze and interpret texts of various genres using comprehension strategies.

CF86C0331C2A4E5AAB64D3A29BDEDEE2.description: How can identity, and implicit and explicit clues influence the interpretation of a text?

213B99E98C7B4C16923ADD2A3599F022.description: Text Comprehension: Understanding of ideas, perspectives, and cultures in texts is supported through the application of reading strategies and processes.

AC6758750D3D44E98C9CBFE1AF0FE014.description: Students analyze the characteristics and structures of text genres to make connections between genres of the same type.

30BFD86DA4D6480A9A5AF9C01951760F.description: How can understanding text characteristics and structures support reading and writing?

01F9195ED6B4447F9BA37C53C884253A.description: Text Organization: Different text genres are used to understand and express ideas, information, and perspectives about the world.

0609D507A26242208C0AD23417FC1B4F.description: Students analyze words to expand their vocabulary, and enhance their oral and written communication across various topics and disciplines.

DE0BEC5358DC4EE781CE0C2938AF2E15.description: How can word formation and meaning enhance vocabulary and improve oral and written communication?

DEF9AF5204404AA3A00B7AA7A2C0CEE8.description: Vocabulary: Understanding the meaning and formation of words facilitates oral communication, reading, and writing.

ED32FF3BDA4742319C965D030901AD1C.description: Students consider criteria for improving their language skills, and communicate consistently in French in authentic oral communication situations that reflect various topics and purposes, spontaneously and in a prepared manner.

0FB3049B6D8A44419029F1968DA944F0.description: Students manage their listening to interpret the meaning of messages in authentic oral communication situations that reflect various topics, purposes, and common language variations.

9D208F45E468433FB512248EFB977ECE.description: How can listening and the language used in oral communication facilitate mutual understanding and identity development?

83FA56D21D2E4CCAB9E9386009EA2606.description: Oral Communication: Oral comprehension and expression promote language development, positive relationships, and collaboration.

5FAF48C44E8C4DEBB00976BE686882C9.description: French Immersion Language Arts and Literature
